message:
Copywriting Exchange 
 
Copywriters find articles on the topic on the Internet, read them, and then retell in their own words. 
 
This is a fairly developed exchange, which is known to many copywriters working on other resources. All because of the convenient service for checking uniqueness, spelling and SEO analysis, which can be used even by an unregistered user. 
 
But on this site they check not only uniqueness, but use it to earn money. Having registered, copywriters can take orders or sell ready-made articles. 
 
To work on this exchange does not need any investment. But with each order, the copywriter will pay a commission to the site. 
 
More information on the official website: http://bit.ly/1textcom
name: JamesHIX
